overview: Straight workout buddies Roman Todd and Devon Felix indulge in an afternoon bromance, while straight friend Vadim Black seduces gay bestie Billie Ramos. Married man Asher Devon meets up with sexy gay Internet crush Nick Capra, and sweet faced Killian James has a secret romp with straight boy Roman Todd. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Straight Boy Seductions 3
